source.ddaf67fe:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import string as st # to get set of characters
source.facc5b30:
col = [a for a in st.ascii_uppercase[:10]]
tmp = np.random.randint(1,30,1000).reshape(100,10)
df = pd.DataFrame(tmp,columns=col)
source.6f4ef68a: sns.kdeplot(df.A,df.C,shade=False,color="g",cbar=True,bw=1.4,n_levels=20) # n_levels is to draw those many contour lines
source.3805c10d:
